message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for us to work together. I'm willing to offer you the product for $10,000. This is a competitive price considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I believe this price is more in line with what I'm willing to pay for the product.
